description: This file defines a public interface 'ProviderClient' specifying methods for provider-specific OAuth2 operations, including constructing authorization URLs, exchanging codes for tokens, fetching user info, and provider identification.

classes.name: ProviderClient
classes.description: A strategy interface for provider-specific OAuth2 operations, enabling different OAuth providers to implement provider-specific logic.

methods.name: buildAuthorizationUrl
methods.description: Builds the provider authorization URL used for redirect during OAuth2 authentication.

methods.name: exchangeCodeForToken
methods.description: Exchanges an authorization code for access and refresh tokens.

methods.name: fetchUserInfo
methods.description: Fetches user information based on the token response, including sub/id, email, name, and picture.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the provider's name identifier, e.g., google, github.

methods.name: isConfigured
methods.description: Checks whether the provider has been properly configured.
